about_the_game:
Pale Coins is an Action RPG set in a fantasy world with challenging combat, open world exploration and a variety of items.
Traverse old forests, dark caves, weathered ruins and unknown places, to find the Champion's Coin and fulfill your greatest wish.





Explore a handcrafted Sword and Sorcery fantasy world and its secrets.



On your journey you will encounter several monsters and the likes. Some of them present a true challenge, so you better be prepared well before facing them in a fight.



Find a variety of weapons and armor, each with different types, movesets and skills, to slay your way through hordes of enemies and tough bosses.
Besides casual weapons and armor you may find equipment with rare enchantments, which grants special boni. If you are lucky, you may also find unique items with unique enchantments and skills.
